patterns.title: Feelings of Inadequacy and Self-Doubt
patterns.description: The patient frequently expresses feelings of inadequacy, as seen in the entries from 2025-02-01 and 2025-02-02, where they mention freezing during a presentation and feeling undeserving of friendship.

patterns.title: Anxiety Triggered by Work Situations
patterns.description: Work-related stress is a significant trigger for anxiety, as evidenced by the presentation incident on 2025-02-01. The patient responds with crying and withdrawal.

patterns.title: Avoidance of Social Interactions
patterns.description: The patient tends to avoid social interactions when feeling low, as noted on 2025-02-02 when they ignored a friend's text.

mood_trends.mood_shift: The mood appears to be improving slightly by 2025-02-03 with the use of coping strategies, but overall remains negative.
mood_trends.notable_times: Afternoons are consistently mentioned, possibly indicating a pattern in mood or activity level.

clinical_prompts: Explore the patient's feelings of inadequacy and their origins.
Discuss the effectiveness and potential expansion of coping strategies like breathing exercises.
Examine the impact of work-related stress and develop strategies to manage it.
Address the patient's tendency to withdraw socially and its effects on their well-being.
strengths_observed: The patient is open to using therapeutic techniques, as seen with the breathing exercise on 2025-02-03.
concerns: The patient's self-worth and negative self-talk, especially in social and work contexts, may require immediate attention.
